mapper.select: select * from user_member where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
mapper.insert: insert into user_member (member_code, id, pw, name, email, addr, tel, birth, naver_login, kakao_login, commcode, subcode) values (member_code_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{addr}, #{tel}, #{birth}, #{naver_login}, #{kakao_login}, #{commcode}, #{subcode})
